original_text: Do not think that it will be difficult for you if he goes free. Remember that he has served you well for six years. He has been worth twice as much as a servant that you pay to do your work. The Lord your God will bless you in everything that you do.
korean_text: 그가 여섯 해 동안에 품꾼의 삯의 배나 받을 만큼 너를 섬겼은즉 너는 그를 놓아 자유하게 하기를 어렵게 여기지 말라 그리하면 네 하나님 여호와께서 네 범사에 네게 복을 주시리라

sentences.original_text: Do not think that it will be difficult for you
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 당신에게 어려울 것이라고 생각하지 마십시오

sentences.original_text: Remember that he has served you well
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 당신을 잘 섬겼다는 것을 기억하십시오

sentences.original_text: He has been worth twice as much
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 두 배 만큼의 가치가 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: as a servant that you pay
The Lord your God will bless you
sentences.korean_translation: 주 당신의 하나님이 당신을 복 주실 것입니다
